Components.Specifications.Language

Interface ILanguageComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLanguageComp

    public interface ILanguageComp
extends IPAMOJAComponent
    Interface providing services for interacting with all language enabled components.
